text: The Bethlehem Baptist Church (BBC) is a megachurch in Minneapolis, Minnesota. The church was started in 1871 as the First Swedish Baptist Church of Minneapolis. Since 1980, their pastor has been John Piper. == Other websites == *Bethlehem Baptist Church Category:Baptist churches Category:Churches in the United States Category:Minneapolis Category:1871 establishments in Minnesota
title: Bethlehem Baptist Church (Minneapolis)
